original_text: Wash, put on perfume, and get dressed in your best clothes. Then go down to the threshing floor, but don’t let him know you are there until he has finished eating and drinking.
korean_text: 그런즉 너는 목욕하고 기름을 바르고 의복을 입고 타작 마당에 내려가서 그 사람이 먹고 마시기를 다 하기까지는 그에게 보이지 말고

sentences.original_text: and get dressed in your best clothes
Then go down to the threshing floor
but don't let him know you are there
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신이 그곳에 있다는 것을 그가 알지 못하게 하라

sentences.original_text: until he has finished eating and drinking
